resources.string:
About this app


App by: David Brain 
Version: 1.0 
Released: July 4, 2014


This app has two goals. The first is to provide you with a useful mapping app that allows you to look at our world in three different ways. In this app you can easily switch between three different map providers: OpenStreetMap Standard, MapQuest Aerial and OpenStreetMap Cycle. In this app you can change the map provider any time you like. You can also drop markers on the map, and they will work across all of the providers.


The second goal is to demonstrate the abilities of the BA3 Mapping Engine in a simple app. The BA3 Mapping Engine is a high-performance library useful to any developer creating apps on iOS, Android and Windows 8 that use maps. As you are using this app, note the speed, smoothness, stability and performance of the engine. You can download a free copy of the SDK along with sample source code and tutorials at http://BA3.us.


If you have questions or comments, send email to info@BA3.us.
